metadata.dc:description: This is an analytical of changes that antibiotics cause on intestinal-microflora with special attention to the antibiotics used in the clinical practice of gastroenterology. We wish to special attention to antibiotics such as metronidazole, clarithromycin, fluoroquinolone, cephalosporin and imipenem. In each case changes produce by this drug and microbial resistance are analyzed. A prudential and justified use of this group of antibiotics is suggested.
metadata.dc:title: Efectos de los antimicrobianos sobre la flora intestinal: sus modificaciones con los antibióticos más utilizados en gastroenterología.
[Antibiotics effects on intestinal flora: its modifications with the antibiotics used in the clinical practice of gastroenterology].
